Package com.facebook.buck.rules.macros

Class QueryTargetsMacro

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.rules.macros.QueryMacro
      • com.facebook.buck.rules.macros.QueryTargetsMacro
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Macro, TargetTranslatable<Macro>
    public abstract class QueryTargetsMacro
extends QueryMacro
    Class providing the type for macros used in `$(query_targets ...)` macro strings. The implementation is provided by the QueryMacro base class.
